snippet.title: EcoGnomix - Announcement Trailer (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2473640/EcoGnomix/

EcoGnomix is a quirky rogue-lite strategy and city-building game. Build a covert business empire, by looting the underground world with a team of gnomes. Combine upgrades strategically to help your gnomes survive an unlimited supply of mystical caves with unique flora and fauna.

Get ready to flex your strategic muscles and take on the challenge in this unique adventure, the future of our gnomes is in your hands!

Features:
- Small gnomes that chop trees and hunt chicken
- Upgrade banners that combine in unexpected ways
- Countless caves with a lot of explorable content
- A settlement with tiny gnomes and small production chains
- Roguelite-style progression with permanent unlockables
- The urge to explore just one more cave
- Great gamepad support for lazy couch sessions

Follow us:
https://twitter.com/UntoldTalesHQ
https://www.facebook.com/untoldtalesgames
https://www.instagram.com/untoldtaleshq/
https://www.tiktok.com/@untoldtales.games

Financially supported by FFF Bayern and the budgetary funds of the Free State of Bavaria
